snippet.title: can dental work, root canals, crowns cause allergy
snippet.description: ... My dentist told me that I had some infection around a couple of my teeth and put me on Keflex for 6 day and then over the next two months I had three root canals and four crowns. During this time, I have developed a severe allergy (Sneezing, itching mouth, stuffy nose. Could these things be related? ...

snippet.title: I have cavities underneath my crowns, GERD and chronic sinusitis. Can these all be related?
snippet.description: ... I've had acid reflux and been on nexium & prevacid for over five years. Last year I had three sinus infections and four sinus infections this year. I also lost tooth #15 due to an abcess and have cavities underneath crowned teeth #3 & 4. Is my GERD causing the other problems? ...

snippet.title: erection is in v shape up to crown thehead stays soft
any problems with taking Reclaspe with alot of dental crowns and root canals?
penis erect in v shape to crown head stays soft
What causes pain top crown of your head. I feel it more when I move my neck, look down or bend over.
my dentist spent 3 hrs in my moth 10 days ago correcting two crowns.
snippet.description: ... My face has been swollen ever since. I have had 1 Medrol pack, taken benedril, advil, antibiotic and now he wants me to take another Medrol pack. I have put arnica gel on my face, aloe- i am at my wits end. It does not hurt but remains swollen. Oh- he has re-xrayed my teeth and they look fine. Could this be latex? Or, an effect of the hydrocordone I took for only one day??? HELP! ...

snippet.title: Many medical references state that Carac is used for AK lesions on the face and anterior scalp. Has it been used effectively for AK lesions on the crown and sides of the scalp?
